page.title: 12A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: On a Monday morning my alarm clock goes off. Chaos is erupting in the house. Soon it is eight o'clock and it is time for my scrambled egg. At eight thirty it is off to school in the car and Mrs Burns blows the whistle for the start of school. She tells us to get our homework and go to our classroom. We have assembly, and then it is time for religion. Soon it is playtime and we play rounders or tag. Mrs Burns blows the whistle for the end of break and it is time for Maths and English. Bell has just been rung for dinner. I have ham rolls and sweets. It is a big playtime and we play rounders. After playtime we have physical education in which we get out apparatus and equipment and do exercises. Soon it is playtime. Then after we have a quiet read. End of school. Hurrah!
